events.message: I received my order today but the product has multiple scratches and a faulty screen. I am very disappointed and need this resolved as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to mentions of scratches and faulty components.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help you resolve this quickly.
Could you please send us photos of the scratches and faulty screen, along with your order number, so we can assess the issue thoroughly?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches on the casing and the screen flickering. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the photos and order details. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement unit as I really like the product. Please proceed with that if possible.
We have processed your replacement request. A new unit will be shipped within 3 business days, and we will provide tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement unit and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it works perfectly, thank you for the quick resolution!
We are glad to hear that the replacement unit is satisfactory. Closing the case now, and feel free to contact us anytime in the future.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on how we handled your case.
